tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Assassin's Creed Meets Parkour in Real Life
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Watch the Behind The Scenes in this link below: youtu.be Parkour/Free Running stunts performed by Ronnie Shalvis. Make sure to check out his youtube channel and facebook page! youtube.com www.facebook.com My friend Stephen Anderson wrote the music for this video! www.stephenjanderson.com Download the song off of iTunes in this link itunes.apple.com The AWESOME costume was made by my friend Allison Dredge! Make sure to check out her facebook page, and make sure to tell her she should work with me again! :) :) www.facebook.com My friend Jared Moench did the visual effects shot of Ronnie/Altair jumping from the building, contact him in this link: missionmoench@gmail.com And for other special thanks for helping film with the green screen: Creigton Baird Brianna Campbell They have a street team of free runners/parkour performers, as well as a dance crew, and bmx crew. Check them out in the link below! www.ensoulcollab.com This was shot all on a Canon 5D Mark III, and a Glidecam HD 2000. http And last but not least, make sure to follow me on twitter and facebook, it's the cool thing to do these days :) www.facebook.com twitter.com For business enquires ONLY, contact me here: devinsupertramp@gmail.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Lets get this video to a million views today! Come on everyone, we can do it,﻿ keep sharing!
Awesome﻿ man!!
Altair will proud﻿ of him
Ahah. Saw you in the puddle.﻿
Steadycam﻿ ;)
STEADICAM﻿
I'd just like to see you do more PK videos,﻿ your fluidity is amazing dude. definite subscriber here, more parkour/freerunning videos please :D
Watch the behind the scenes, they﻿ explain it all there :)
It's funny how is he running, but on the other side his parkour skills are awesome..﻿ maybe you should get a chance to do stunts in AC movie ? Like !
what surprised me most is that﻿ is shirt is still white.

i think that every assassin´s creed player who looks this video,﻿ is just thinking " wow " . this is amazing because parcour isn´t very easy. and it´s awesome, that it looks like the camera is flying behind him. but one small critic i have, ezio isn´t able to climb trees. ;D
all in all it is a very good video! thumbs up from me !
Amazing!﻿
Google+﻿ wasted time of your life, not this video.
Wow that would be a great﻿ video.
Ezio﻿ cant climb tree, HAHAHAHAHAHAHA
Parkour﻿ is so impressive. Holy crap
Its the most comfortable﻿ way to do parkour. Besides, this is real life man, its still amazing he did the impersonation, and it worked out amazingly. Props!
I want to marry﻿ this man.
Desmond?﻿
very nice﻿ video, well done!
I swear to all things holy, after all his animus﻿ training, if Desmond isn't like this in AC3, I'mma open a can of whoopass(assin) on Ubisoft....
awesome ﻿
awesome parkour!! Ronnie is super﻿ talented!! i have been hearing around about how Desmond is gonna be hardcore in the newest AC! i would love to see him do these moves also!! xD
1 million in four﻿ days?

Reviewer.Books: Coloring books and I Can Read For Ages 1 to 3

Reviewer.Job: I wanna be a teacher one day...
Reviewer.Music: Christina Perry, Nickelback, Skillet, Superchick, Evanescence, etc...
Reviewer.School: I wanna study psychiology just for being interested in it... I also wanna learn Japanese and Russia one day...
